name: HEAVBlog
0:
”Alexa, Open heave blog”
”Alexa, Open heave blog and read the latest blog post”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heave blog
des:
Home Educators Association of Virginia is a member-supported, non-profit homeschool association. Since 1983, HEAV has successfully worked to promote and protect home education in Virginia. HEAV, coming from a biblical worldview, serves all homeschoolers—regardless of religious or philosophical beliefs. Membership is open to all. We’re ready to answer your questions, offer support, and serve your needs year-round—just give us a call (804-278-9200) or send an e-mail to office@heav.org we're here to help!


You can find out more about the Home Educators Association of Virginia (HEAV) at www.heav.org. 

Engage the skill by saying:
 Alexa, Start HEAV Blog
or
 Alexa, Begin HEAV Blog

Once the skill is engaged, try the following commands:
Play the latest blog post
Search for Robots
Help

**For information about this Alexa skill, visit www.CreateMyVoice.com or send an email to Support@CreateMyVoice.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
